osyfe.graphic

Class Texture.Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Texture.Config
  • Enclosing class:
    Texture

    public static class Texture.Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents texture configuration options which are set when loading the texture.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Config() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture.Config alpha()
      Disables RGB and enables alpha.
      Texture.Config border_color(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Specifies the border color.
      Texture.Config filter_linear()
      Linear texture zooming (the default).
      Texture.Config filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture zooming.
      Texture.Config integer(boolean integer)
      Sets an integer or floating value texture (default: false).
      Texture.Config linearRGB(boolean linear)
      Sets linear RGB or sRGB color data interpretation (default: false).
      Texture.Config mag_filter_linear()
      Linear texture in zooming (the default).
      Texture.Config mag_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture in zooming.
      Texture.Config min_filter_linear()
      Linear texture out zooming (the default).
      Texture.Config min_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture out zooming.
      Texture.Config mipmap_filter_linear()
      Linear mipmap interpolation (the default).
      Texture.Config mipmap_filter_nearest()
      Rounded mipmap interpolation.
      Texture.Config mipmap(boolean generate)
      Enable/disable mipmap generation (default: true).
      Texture.Config rgb()
      Enables RGB and disables alpha (the default).
      Texture.Config rgba()
      Enables RGB and alpha.
      Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_border()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the specified border color.
      Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_border(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the specified border color.
      Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_edge()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_edge(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Texture.Config wrap_mirrored_reapeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated mirrored.
      Texture.Config wrap_mirrored_reapeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated mirrored.
      Texture.Config wrap_repeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated.
      Texture.Config wrap_repeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated.

        Disables RGB and enables alpha.

      • border_color

        public Texture.Config border_color(float r,
                                   float g,
                                   float b,
                                   float a)
        Specifies the border color.

      • filter_linear

        public Texture.Config filter_linear()
        Linear texture zooming (the default). Incompatible with integer valued textures.

      • filter_nearest

        public Texture.Config filter_nearest()
        Rounded texture zooming.

      • integer

        public Texture.Config integer(boolean integer)
        Sets an integer or floating value texture (default: false). Integer textures are incompatible with linear filtering and ignore the linearRGB setting.

      • linearRGB

        public Texture.Config linearRGB(boolean linear)
        Sets linear RGB or sRGB color data interpretation (default: false).

      • mag_filter_linear

        public Texture.Config mag_filter_linear()
        Linear texture in zooming (the default). Incompatible with integer valued textures.

      • mag_filter_nearest

        public Texture.Config mag_filter_nearest()
        Rounded texture in zooming.

      • min_filter_linear

        public Texture.Config min_filter_linear()
        Linear texture out zooming (the default). Incompatible with integer valued textures.

      • min_filter_nearest

        public Texture.Config min_filter_nearest()
        Rounded texture out zooming.

      • mipmap_filter_linear

        public Texture.Config mipmap_filter_linear()
        Linear mipmap interpolation (the default). Incompatible with integer valued textures.

      • mipmap_filter_nearest

        public Texture.Config mipmap_filter_nearest()
        Rounded mipmap interpolation.

      • mipmap

        public Texture.Config mipmap(boolean generate)
        Enable/disable mipmap generation (default: true).

      • rgb

        public Texture.Config rgb()
        Enables RGB and disables alpha (the default).

      • rgba

        public Texture.Config rgba()
        Enables RGB and alpha.

      • wrap_clamp_to_border

        public Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_border()
        Texture coordinates are clamped to the specified border color.

      • wrap_clamp_to_border

        public Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_border(int axis)
        Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the specified border color.

      • wrap_clamp_to_edge

        public Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_edge()
        Texture coordinates are clamped to the edge color (the default).

      • wrap_clamp_to_edge

        public Texture.Config wrap_clamp_to_edge(int axis)
        Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the edge color (the default).

      • wrap_mirrored_reapeat

        public Texture.Config wrap_mirrored_reapeat()
        Texture coordinates are repeated mirrored.

      • wrap_mirrored_reapeat

        public Texture.Config wrap_mirrored_reapeat(int axis)
        Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated mirrored.

      • wrap_repeat

        public Texture.Config wrap_repeat()
        Texture coordinates are repeated.

      • wrap_repeat

        public Texture.Config wrap_repeat(int axis)
        Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated.
